alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wayne; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 04 at 9:08PM CST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Little Wabash River at Carmi. .The Little Wabash River at Carmi continues to rise and is forecast to crest around the middle of next week. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Wabash River at Carmi. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, The inundation of county roads begins. At 32.0 feet, Flood waters flow up McHenry slough and areas near Route 1 and 14 in Carmi begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CST Saturday the stage was 26.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight and continue rising to a crest of 32.0 feet early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
